Title: How to buy?
Description: Firstly step: should make sure you are using the account you need to buy the products with, Second step: you are to review you account information as this information we will use to delive products to you, Third step: shop around in different categories and whenever you select any product you should add it to your cart, Fourth step: go to your cart page and click buy

Title: How to sell you products?
Description: Unfortunately this service is under maintainance currently but soon it will be availabe.

Title: Payment methods?
Description: Currently we support paying with paypal and mastercard for online paying, if this does not fill your needs you can pay cash when your order is delivered to you with our sales representative

Title: Have a problems with ordering items?
Description: You can communicate with our customer care team via Whatsapp number: 01121212121

Title: Your order is not deliverd on time?
Description: Please send us an email on (ccare@resonant.org) with subject: late orders and we will try our best to solve your problem very soon.
